long_description: With 475 lumens for confident navigation, the Lezyne Power Drive XL Front Bike Light offers commuters and evening riders, sleek, compact lighting in a machined aluminum body. A single high-performance LED emits a 475-lumen beam that runs for 1.5 hrs. on high and 11.5 hrs. on flashing; recharge after your ride with the included USB cable. Light can be seen from the side to enhance visibility in traffic. A specialized power-saving mode allows quick switching between high lighting and medium lighting. Power Indicator button allows the user to check the power level any time. The Lezyne Power Drive XL Front Bike Light includes a Lezyne wall adaptor to recharge at an outlet, Micro USB charging cable and handlebar mounts.
short_description: With 475 lumens for confident navigation, the Lezyne Power Drive XL Front Bike Light offers commuters and evening riders, sleek, compact lighting in a machined aluminum body.
